MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description:
Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models. Your very own.
We're driven by thousands of independent voters. Altogether, we develop Perfect Desire, an evolving platform of free and simple business plan calculators for everyone.
At Dynamic Applications, we are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain. We vote in online democracy, we deliver for free. We work for you, and we call them Dynamic Applications.
RoboSoft.Press_Release_Search_String: Dynamic Applications releases Predicted Desire v1.99, the final version. We are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain.
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer:
For people working on Publications, Reviewers and Testers. Thank you for all your work. We appreciate it. Your comments define our next idea.
DLROW-III-MODEL 2016 - 2017 - 2018 UNLIMITED UPGRADES
This code will upgrade you to Perfect Desire, our most professional application.

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win2000,WinXP,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Windows 8,Windows 10,WinServer,WinOther,Windows2000,Windows2003,Windows Server 2000,Windows Server 2003,Windows Server 2008,Windows Server 2008r2,Windows Server 2012,Windows Tablet PC Edition 2005,Windows Media Center Edition 2005,WinVista,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Ultimate,WinVista x64,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64,Windows Vista Ultimate x64
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: 2020.01.01 - v2.00 - 2020 dna license, AGB, Terms and Conditions. 2019.01.01 - v1.99 - 2019 dna licence. 2018.01.18 - v1.98 - Settings Dialog brings a few options. Website Links renewed. 2017.02.15 - v1.96 - final version of Predicted Desire. Next Update shall be called Startup Product Manager.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 1280x768 + Display. No Spyware, no adware, no data transfer. It's your business. We respect that.
Program_Info.Awards: Softpedia award for 100% adware and spyware free small business software, see http://www.softpedia.com/get/Others/Finances-Business/Predicted-Desire.shtml#status

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Press_Release.Press_Release:
Dynamic Applications releases Predicted Desire, - the final version.
This is the final version of Predicted Desire, a simple and easy product calculation client. From v2.0, Predicted Desire will be called Startup Product Manager.
We keep this version and continue to host PD through 2018.
How it works
Predicted Desire will calculate your product's various cost, revenue and net profit over 48 months.
Being the first ever sample of the Perfect Desire platform, it's capable of calculating basically any Formula System over time, including a Solver Algorithm capable of solving simple Differential Equations.
PD will calculate all Targets, predict and graphically display a company's proceedings over the next 48 months in the reference model. Based on the set of Input Parameters and Formula, the user interface is built automatically by parsing and interpretation of the simulation models's equation system.
SocialMedia Followers leading the path of Development
Accompanying the Release, which went through a beta phase with a few hundred freelance testers, two SocialMedia Competitions have been started. At twitter.com/dynamic_idea, a public voting competition allows everyone to suggest, favour, and retweet new simulation ideas. Every Month, Dynamic Applications is working on the top voted idea, and it will be available one (1) month for free, at least, for the SocialMedia crowd after completion.
Roadmap
In parallel to @dynamic_idea, there is a Roadmap, Bug and Feature competition at @dynamic_qs, so users can as well prioritize our product Roadmap. We call it Customer Driven Development.
Since our roadmap is community defined, we try to give every person in the world a fair chance to participate, supposed they can get access to a free Twitter account.
This way, we are Sharing Economy. It's an experiment in Swarm Intelligence, as we define Online Democracy. Is it possible? - we say yes.
About Dynamic Applications
Dynamic Applications was founded on January 01, 2016. The Founder and first Software Developer of Dynamic Applications is Martin Bernhardt. He has researched not only any public information about the System Dynamics approach, but has also been working with two companies in the Strategic Asset Management market.
Dynamic Applications has no flyers, sales consultants, traditional marketing, or budget. Our strategy is called Growth Hacking: we spend as much time as possible on Research and Development of the Software. Following an Agile Development approach, we're working our way all up from the very bottom. We try to make the crap we started from better, every day. We just hope there are people out there who'll find our products any useful.
Dynamic Applications is a community approach. We pay with a Tweet, and define the next big thing to publish.
We are Dynamic Applications. We work to empower people. We are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain.
Press_Release.Keywords: Sharing Economy, Startup, Product, Calculation, Business Plan, Cost, Profit, Amortization, System Dynamics, Business Dynamics, Predicted Desire, Dynamic Applications
Press_Release.Headline: Dynamic Applications releases Predicted Desire, the final version.
Press_Release.Summary: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on customers, product cost, efficiency, sales, and profit. We support Startups around the globe.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Keywords: SocialMedia, 21st century, App, Developer, Internet of Things, PV, Forest, Energy, Truck, Startup, Product, growth, contribution, business, plan, Dynamic Applications, dynamicons, Sharing Economy
Site.Site_Description_100: We develop Dynamic Applications. They empower people. We are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain.
Site.Site_Description_250: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost and benefit. We support Startups in quickly checking Business Case options. We develop a platform for free business model calculators. We call them Dynamic Applications.
Site.Site_Description_450: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost-benefit optimization. We support Startups to quickly check options within their Business Plan. Altogether, we create Small Business developments, an evolving platform of free business plan calculators. We work for you, and all do-it-yourself parts be free.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: This software is published under a Creative Commons cc-by-sa alike license, free to share. See EULA for details.

English.Keywords: Dynamic Applications, Predicted Desire, Business, Plan, Startup, Product, Cost, Profit, Amortization, Calculation, Sharing Economy, dynamicons, System Dynamics
English.Char_Desc_80: Startup Product Cost-Profit and Business Case Simulation in System Dynamics.
English.Char_Desc_250: If you could look 1 year ahead, would you want to see? Predicted Desire is calculating a Startup with a single product. Fine-tune as many cost-driving parameters as you want. See revenue and net profit results graphically displayed over 48 months.
English.Char_Desc_450: If you could look 1 year ahead, would you want to see? - we'll give you 4 years. Predicted Desire is calculating the business of a Startup producing a single product. Fine-tune as many cost-driving, efficiency, and sales parameters as you want. See the combined company revenue and net profit results over 48 months. It allows for a complete Return-on-Invest calculation and allows to get a quick overview over any possible scenario options.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
If you could look 1 year ahead of competition, would you want to see? - We'll give you 4 years. Predicted Desire, our historic pilot, will help you to find new solutions for your 21st century Startup.
Fine-tune cost-driving, efficiency, and sales parameters as you want. See their combined effect on Cost, Revenue, and Net Profit. PD allows for a complete Return-on-Invest analysis. Quickly check any possibilities and options. Let go of the past. Start today and think only about what's possible to achieve within the next 4 years.
Input Values: Employees, Salary per hour, Work hours, Work days, Fixed Cost, Sales Tax, Material, Ingredients, Energy, Production time, Product Price - Daily Production - Daily Sales to Customers.
Target Values: Daily Income, Monthly Income - Daily Production Cost - Productive Time of Employees - Total Cost, Employee Cost, Material Cost - Monthly Revenue - Net Profit - Bank Account Balance.
Simulated ToolTips, showing all Formulas in live calculation.
Transparency. Privacy Protection. And participation. our values. No data gathering, no Server behind you. Switch off your WiFi and check that out.
Customer Driven Development. Two user competitions on Twitter allow everyone to vote on our best simulation ideas, as well as the public roadmap. Pay with a Tweet, and define the next big thing we publish.
All in all, Predicted Desire is a fully capable, fast and working Business Planner. It supports an interactive Startup Business Planner in form of the Bakery Tutorial. The full SourceCode of Predicted Desire is available with Perfect Desire, the Professional Business Model Development Environment of Dynamic Applications.
Further types of Free Business Planners for specific purposes are available on the Manufacturer's Website.
